name: Ambiflow
description:
This puzzle coordination game will force you to twist, bend, and sometimes  smash your left & right brain together. Minimalist graphics and beautiful original soundtrack keep you company while you find your flow.  

Use W, A, S, D to control the orange ball and Up, Left, Down, Right to control the green ball.  More levels on the way.

This game is still being developed, thanks for the support and feedback! (hedeer@elshowk.com)
